ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: So Runnyeye is a good place for say a Lvl 15-16?  If so I might go there instade of Unrest, or maybe go to both, just take turns one day go to Runnyeye the
ygData.messageBody:
So Runnyeye is a good place for say a Lvl 15-16? If so I might go there
instade of Unrest, or maybe go to both, just take turns one day go to
Runnyeye the next go to Unrest or so. I would really love to get my hands
on some blackened armor or any good armor, all I have right now is leather
and a good hat, not sure what it is.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> Well at least you made it very clear what you think about that place...
but
> I personally liked that place since you had the constant fear for Borxx
all the
> time and we had some very close runs away from her. Once i had only 1 HP
> left after zoning from Runnyeye... that inspired me to write a story to
EQVault
> titled 'Borxx got me... NOT!' and had some great responses to that story.
I
> will certainly go back to Runnyeye just to finally see her slayed down
when
> I am done with Mistmoore... though it will probably take a few levels
before
> I will leave Faydwer again. I myself didn't die too many times there, and
at
> that time i didn't really care about it. I got past level 20 in there and
i think i
> leveled 4 or 5 times fighting in there. At 22 i went back to Faydwer.
>
> Iyenya Goldenheart
> Lvl 24 dwarf cleric
> Innoruuk server
>
